features: Powerful Magnetic Knife Block:Three ultra-strong permanent magnets built in to Fomidao magnetic knife block without knives draws the metal tip of your kitchen knives when inserted,double-sided magnetic keep your entire knives collection organized and easily accessible.

Premium Wood and Stainless Steel Craftsmanship: Each base of magentic knife holder is meticulously crafted with high-quality wood,304 stainless steel adopt straight wire drawing process makes the whole knife holder beauty and elegance.

Sturdy and Durable Non-slip Base:Bottom with four suction cups with reinforcement screws,it makes the knife block more safe and stable,you can place it on countertop firmly,no need worry about shaking when you take knife.

Easy to Install and Clean: Without drilling holes,you only need to install the screws step by step acoocding to our instuction,magnetic knife stand with stainless steel material and smooth surface allows for easy cleaning and maintenance,wipe it with a damp cloth to keep it clean,anti-rust and dry easily.

Convenient to Use: Double-sided magnetic knife holder experience the convenience and visible, keep your knives within reach,Knives are easily accessible when you need them, there is no need to rummage in drawers looking for knives, you can get knife you need accurately from knife holder,it just takes up a little space to organize your knives and keep countertop tidy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Double Side Magnetic Knife Block:This knife block without knives allows you to hold more knives than most knife blocks on the market and it small enough to versatilely fit into many nooks and crannies in your kitchen or workspace

Powerful Magnetic Knife Block: Kitchen knife holder with two dual magnetic stripe inside, double-sided storage with strong magnets securely holds your knives and enough to hold knives of all sizes. Waterproof & Easy to Clean Knife Block: Magnetic knife holder is made from high quality 304 stainless steel, With its sleek metal look which is easy to clean, and looks great in the kitchen or any room where you install it. A great gift for your family and friends!

Why you choose our magnetic knife block? The heavy and thick wooden base and 4 suction cups make it more stable on the table Flat and smooth surface and made with 304 stainless steel, you can wipe clean with a damp cloth easily or water clean directly 304 stainless steel material not easy to mold or rust

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and works for a good price
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our zwilling henkels pro 7 pc knife set. Our kitchen is too small to install the magnetic strip that came with the knife. This was easy to assemble, the suction cups works well on our quartz counter. The magnet holds the knives in place and are the knives easy to remove when you nees to use them. It goes well with our modern kitchen decor. Not sure how much it stands up to use over time but at the price point, I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and functional
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was relatively easy, although it seems to stand at a slight angle (not entirely vertical) once assembled. This doesn't affect its use, though. So far it works as intended to keep the knife set handy yet out of the way. I got this mainly because my knife block held the knives in such a way that I could not keep it entirely under my upper cabinets - the handles were too high.But this works under those cabinets. Its fit and finish are nice, although you'll see some bit of a gap in the photo. All things considered I would recommend this knife block. It also makes it easier to grab the correct knife - the type that have the knife blades hidden can result in pulling several knives before getting the one you need. With this one all of the blades are visible. So you grab the correct knife every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as pictured
reviews.reviewText: Great replacement for knife block. Saves space and it’s easier to find the knife you want. I like that it doesn’t have plexiglass cover over the magnetized portion making it easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and works even better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly. Saves space
reviews.reviewText: I like that it holds a lot of knives and scissors and does it take up very much space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a few knife blocks, but I find they are awkward and slow. It's so much easier to grab my knives off a magnetic bar or in this case a magnetic knife block. I use both in my kitchen, with my most commonly used knives on the bar, and the rest on this block.Mine was ready to go out of the box. I prefer this all metal style to the wood ones. It's easier to clean and there's no moisture absorption. Make sure though that that your knives are completely dry when putting them on the block, and obviously avoid hitting the edge/tip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted.
reviews.reviewText: Works great and freed up some space. If I had to replace it, I would buy the same thing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great looks good

reviews.reviewText: I thought it was a bit on the pricey side, but it is larger and heavier than I expected, which is a good thing as it feels very solid. It was a gift and I liked it and my wife liked it. My only complaint is I don't like the exposed acorns nuts that attaches it together, I would preferred if these were hidden somehow using different connectors.
